name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DUANG AI copilot-writing/summarize/chat for PDF/WORD/TXT Anywhere

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Duang AI Tab,Use 1-Click AI Anywhere,all AI in one page,all prompt in one page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your workflow with Duang AI, an AI extension designed to streamline your tasks seamlessly. Experience the power of generative AI and enjoy a seven-day free trial upon download.

Say goodbye to tab-switching hassles while accessing AI tools like ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Copilot, and Kimi.

What tasks can AI automate for you? Duang AI is an All-in-One AI Assistant powered by GPT-4, offering features such as:

1ï¸âƒ£ Reinvent your Chrome Startpage with AI capabilities, empowering your new tab with intelligent suggestions.
2ï¸âƒ£ Summarize videos, scrape websites, respond to emails, automate searches, summarizations, translations, and writing tasks on websites with AI.
3ï¸âƒ£ AI Writer: Create content for social media, emails, art, code, and more.
4ï¸âƒ£ Plugins: Access the best AI plugins directly on your browser, including AI Chat and compatibility with PDF/WORD/TXT files.

Experience 1-Click AI Prompts Anywhere! Unlock the magic of AI with just one click on any webpage to enhance your productivity.

ğŸ¯ Manage custom prompts in the 'one-click-prompt' section in the extension Settings.

ğŸ¯ Switch to the 'Search' tab in the sidebar, ask any question, and receive quick answers with cited search results.
ğŸ¯ Discover and run professional 1-click AI prompts on wboke.com for free.
ğŸ¯ Manage your list of favorite websites, pin them to the start screen or sidebar for quick access.

Duang AI offers real-time suggestions based on context extraction to enhance your online experienceâ€”available on all your favorite websites and web apps.
